body:
Elegant Solution.
Concept ACK.
In the long run, we should probably also improve the 250ms polling on `WalletModel::pollBalanceChanged()`

Will test.

> also improve the 250ms polling

You mean remove polling? :trollface:

<!--a722867cd34abeea1fadc8d60700f111-->
